p.k: After Robin swipes her cloak, Raven's figure is revealed and she transforms into Lady Legasus; meanwhile Cyborg gets stuck in the cloak, revealing a dark side of his personality. / The Titans overuse Raven's dark magic, causing unintended consequences. / When Robin, Cyborg, and Beast Boy get trapped in an elevator the limits of their friendship are tested, while Starfire and Raven bond with a supervillain. / When he is tasked with looking after the Bat-cave, Robin questions his relationship with Batman while struggling to keep the other Titans in line. / Robin convinces the Titans to go back to school with him so he can finally become the all-American class president-type he's dreamt of being.
